title: Wall of Ice
tags: how to acquire wall of ice
content:
n: Raise a wall of solid ice that deals 10∼60 Cold Damage to anyone standing in its way. When the ice is broken, it leaves behind a cloud of frigid air that deals 10∼60 Cold damage per turn to creatures within. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: DEX Save

How to Acquire Wall of Ice

Wall of Ice can be acquired by the following classes: Wizard Wall of Ice can be cast by using the following Items: ???
